SELECT A.no AS id , A.type AS type , A.sub_type AS subType , A.board_code AS boardCode , A.uid AS uid , A.nick_name AS nickName , DATE_FORMAT(A.wdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS strWdate , A.subject AS subject , A.content AS content , A.link AS link , A.hit AS hit , A.thumbnail AS thumbnail , IFNULL(B.hphone,'') AS hphone , IFNULL(B.email, '') AS email , IFNULL(C.board_name, '') AS boardName , IFNULL(C.type, '') AS boardType FROM ${type} A LEFT JOIN netfu_member B ON A.uid = B.uid LEFT JOIN netfu_board_admin C ON A.board_code = C.board_code
A.no = #{id}

SELECT IFNULL(A.type, '') AS boardType , IFNULL(A.board_code, '') AS boardCode FROM netfu_board_admin A
A.board_code = #{boardCode}
SELECT IFNULL(no, 0) FROM ${type} A WHERE board_code = #{boardCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ${type} SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE board_code = #{boardCode} AND no = #{id}
